definitions.body: testimony of the Ten Words on the tables as a solemn divine charge, ´[[לֻחׂת הע]] Ex 31:18, Ex 32:15, Ex 34:29 (P), ´[[הע]] Ex 25:16, Ex 25:21, Ex 40:20 (P); ark as containing tables, ´[[אֲרוֹן הע]] Ex 25:22, Ex 26:33, Ex 26:34, Ex 30:6, Ex 30:26, Ex 39:35, Ex 40:3, Ex 40:5, Ex 40:21, Nu 4:5, Nu 7:89 (all P), Jos 4:16 (JE; Kue [[הברית]] [ag. him Di], so Benn Steuernag), ´[[הארן לע]] Ex 31:7 (P); abbrev. ´[[לִפְנֵי הע]] Ex 16:34, Ex 30:36, Nu 17:19, Nu 17:10 (P); ´[[עַל הע]] Ex 27:21 (= ´[[הע]] Le 24:3), Ex 30:6, Le 16:13 (P); tabernacle as containing ark of testimony, ´[[משׁכן הע]] tabernacle of the testimony Ex 38:21, Nu 1:50, Nu 1:53, Nu 1:53, Nu 10:11 (P); so ´[[אׂהֶל הע]] Nu 9:15, Nu 17:22, Nu 17:23, Nu 18:2 (P) 2Ch 24:6.

the code of law in gen. (late), as a testimony of God: Ps 19:8, Ps 119:88, Ps 122:4; ‖[[תּוֹרָה]] Ps 78:5; ‖[[חׂק]] Ps 81:6. In titles, [[עַל־]] ´[[שׁוּשַׁן ע]] Ps 60:1, ´[[אֶל־שׁׂשַׁנּ֑ים ע]] Ps 80:1 = melody whose first line cp. law as testimony to a choice flower. Special laws of the code are denoted by pl.; + [[חֻקּוֹת]] etc. 1Ki 2:3, 2Ki 23:3 = 2Ch 34:31 (+ [[חקים]] etc.), Je 44:23; [[חֻקִּים]] etc. 1Ch 29:19; [[מִחְוֹת]] Ne 9:34; pl. of contents of covenant 2Ki 17:15; pl. elsewh. Ps 119:14, Ps 119:31, Ps 119:36, Ps 119:99, Ps 119:111, Ps 119:129, Ps 119:144, Ps 119:157. Vid. also III. [[[עֵדָה]]].—For [[הָעֵדוּת]] 2Ki 11:12 = 2Ch 23:11 rd. prob. [[הַצְּעָדוֹת]] (cf. 2Sa 1:10 We al.).
